name: Hell's Bakery (BifrostGames)
description:
Hell's Bakery is a semester project for the UNL Game Development Club Fall 2022 semester.

The monsters of hell are invading! Defend your bakery!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Left Mouse Click - throw pastry

P - pause

Credits:

Team Lead: Ben Laube

Lead Programmer: Sam Gittelman

Artists: Shahad Al Elew and Ansley Brown

Enjoy!
